alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Clay; Decatur; Dougherty; Early; Grady; Miller; Mitchell; Quitman; Randolph; Seminole; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 31 at 6:18AM EDT until March 31 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 84 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 AM EDT /7 AM CDT/ THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA HENRY HOUSTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA FRANKLIN GADSDEN LEON LIBERTY WAKULLA IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA BAY CALHOUN GULF JACKSON WASHINGTON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 13 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER CALHOUN CLAY DECATUR DOUGHERTY EARLY GRADY MILLER MITCHELL QUITMAN RANDOLPH SEMINOLE TERRELL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBEVILLE, ABBEVILLE MUNICIPAL A/P, ABE SPRINGS, ALBANY, APALACHICOLA, ARLINGTON, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAGBY STATE PARK, BAINBRIDGE, BAY CITY, BEACHTON, BELLVIEW, BENEVOLENCE, BENNETT, BETHEL, BEVERLY, BLACKWOOD, BLAKELY, BLOUNTSTOWN, BOYKIN, BRADFORDVILLE, BRANCHVILLE, BROWNTOWN, BUCK SIDING, CAIRO, CAIRO, CALLAWAY, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CAPITOLA, CARRABELLE, CENTERVILLE, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHIPLEY, CHIPLEY MUNICIPAL MUNICIPAL A/P, DAYS CROSSROADS, DECATUR CO A/P, DICKEY, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DOTHAN, DOUGLASVILLE, DOVEREL, DURHAM, EARLY CO A/P, EAST ALBANY, ECONFINA, EDISON, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, ENTERPRISE, FAIRCHILD, FIVE POINTS, FORT GADSDEN, FORT GAINES, FRINK, GEORGETOWN, GRACEVILLE, GRADY CO A/P, GRAVES, HANOVER, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HATCHER, HAWKINSTOWN, HEADLAND, HEADLAND MUNICIPAL A/P, HEROD, HILLIARDVILLE, HOGGARD MILL, HONEYVILLE, HOWARD CREEK, IVEYS MILL, JONES CROSSING, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LAWRENCEVILLE, LITTLE HOPE, LITTMAN, LOCKETT CROSSING, LYNN, LYNN HAVEN, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MALONE, MARIANNA, MARYSVILLE, MAYHAW, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MOORES CROSSROADS, MORGAN, NEWTON, NIXON, OAK GROVE, ODENA, ORANGE HILL, PANAMA CITY, PECAN, PELHAM,
